review:
Good doctor very polite and listening. Visited for lumps in my hands and legs. 
And he was on time .

I visited this doc because I had cough while lying down.. he suggested several test and we did all... and got admitted.. *** **** ** *** *** *** ****** *** ** *** ** ***** *** *** *** ******** ** ***** when visited ENT doc at same hospital and I was diagnosed with allergetic rhinitis and I was given a nasal spray as solution.. I still can't figure out were so many test and scan required? ***** ******* ******* *** *********** when I was admitted he used to visit everyday twice and I was charged 750 ×2 each day.. **** ** ****** ********* ** ******* I think when we say we are covered with insurance hospital and doctors think they can bill as much as possible. ******* *** ***** ** *** ******* ***** ** * *** ******* ** **** ********** **** ****** *** ****** ** ****** since I was admitted for a long time at hospital for other medical reasons they could not find visible vein . Every nurse has failed min twice while putting canula or drawing blood. At last I was fed up *** **** ** ****** ** **** *** ********* the entire experience was horrible..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i highly recommend  Dr Jagadeesh Chandra .. very nice person and  Friendly .....reachable most of time
